thread.section_title: RoundAbout Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RoundAbout Travel | roundabouttravel.com.au
thread.title: Sue Tchan
thread.title_full: RoundAbout Travel reviewed by Sue Tchan

author: Sue Tchan
title: Sue Tchan
text: Booked a round-the-world trip with this company in December 2016 for departure June 2017. They responded to my enquiry immediately and I had my choices of schedules, stopovers and airlines within 24 hours. No complaints whatsoever. Very courteous service. Would definitely use them again and have already recommended them to friends.
